sense.def:
To make a reference to someone or something
pomeni govoriti o neki osebi ali stvari ali jo omeniti;

seg.quote: ...the person to whom Philip had made such contemptuous reference.
There is no further reference to him in her diary.

sense.def:
Reference
pomeni tudi iskanje podatkov pri določeni osebi ali viru.

seg.quote: They acted without reference to the police committee.

sense.def:
A reference
je tudi oznaka, na primer številka ali ime, ki nam pove, kje lahko dobimo podatke.

seg.quote: ...the two page references that I gave you.

sense.def:
V knjigi ali knjižnici, ki je
reference
, lahko poiščemo različne podatke.

seg.quote: Dear Sir, With reference to your recent communication, the matter is being dealt with.

sense.def:
To give someone a reference
pomeni napisati nekomu, ki išče službo, izjavo o tem, kaj zna in zmore in kakšen je njegov značaj.
